prompts.title: Case Study Blog Post
prompts.description: Generate a blog post based on a detailed case study of a successful business initiative

variables.name: company
variables.description: Company featured in the case study

variables.name: wordCount
variables.description: Desired length of the blog post

variables.description: Desired length of the blog post

prompts.description: Generate a blog post that reviews the highlights of a specific industry over the past year
